abstract: The government wants to get hip to Facebook and other social sites, but a plethora of laws and regulations is making it hard.
snippet: The government wants to get hip to Facebook and other social sites, but a plethora of laws and regulations is making it hard.
lead_paragraph: “Do I need to P.I.A. Facebook?” said the perplexed bureaucrat squished into a narrow basement hotel conference room in Washington DC.
